title: Power Unit Converter (W, kW, HP, BTU/hr, ton)

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: W = value × factorToW[sourceUnit] target = W ÷ factorToW[targetUnit] Example: 5 hp (mechanical) → kW: 5 × 745.6998716 = 3728.499358 W 3728.499358 ÷ 1000 = 3.7285 kW

changes: Initial audit spec draft generated from HTML extraction (review required).

Confirm sources are authoritative and relevant to the calculator methodology.
